availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Fulton County, Kentucky, farmer. Germany native. Married to Ellen Francis Taylor in Fulton County on August 15, 1858. Farmer in Fulton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, p. 456.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Fulton County Marriages, Film #000321403, p. 290.
Find A Grave, "Fritz Frederick Leip (1824-1893)," Memorial #77868811, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/77868811 (accessed September 7, 2020).
